title: Oranges and lemons (A)
creator_contributor_role: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School, production company
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Prejudices
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Discrimination - Australia
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Racism - Australia
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Race discrimination - Australia
description: A documentary on the early education of aboriginal children. It looks at a special pre-school program to help prepare aboriginal children for school, which has been set up in Dareton, Victoria. It suggests that in the face of insensitive attitudes, conventional education will further undermine aboriginal culture.
